mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS b_id, b.publish_time AS b_publish_time, b.image_url as b_image_url, cf.id AS cf_id, cf.project_name AS project_name FROM tb_banner b LEFT JOIN tb_crowfound cf on b.crowfound_id=cf.id WHERE b.crowfound_id>=0

SELECT b.id AS b_id, b.publish_time AS b_publish_time, b.image_url as b_image_url, g.id as "goods.id", g.goods_name AS "goods.goodsName" FROM tb_banner b LEFT JOIN tb_goods g on b.goods_id=g.id WHERE b.goods_id>=0
SELECT fb.id AS fb_id, fb.publish_date AS fb_publish_time, fb.image_url as fb_image_url, f.id "film.id", f.film_name "film.filmname" FROM tb_film_banner fb LEFT JOIN tb_film f on fb.film_id=f.id
SELECT b.id,b.image_url AS bannerImageUrl FROM tb_banner b WHERE b.id=#{id}
